all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And upon this rock I will build my church; yea, upon this rock ye are built, and if ye continue, the gates of hell shall not prevail against you.
Doctrine and Covenants 33:13
Quote of the Day
"The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints enables access to God’s power because it is authorized by Him."
Dale G. Renlund | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
